Make them more aerodynamic: Improve the shape of the roller skates to increase speed and maneuverability.
Incorporate a shock absorber: Add a shock absorber to the wheels to reduce the impact on the skater's joints during rough ground surfaces.
Improve the grip: Develop new wheels with better traction to prevent slipping on different terrains.
Make them more stable: Adjust the center of gravity or add more weight to the front or back of the skates for better stability.
Enhance the grip tape: Add a textured grip tape on the underside the skates to improve traction on various surfaces.
